Detailed Description

An interface into the OGRE VFS system.

This class does NOT wrap a single Ogre::Archive, but rather an entire resource group in Ogre. You can use this class to tap into all paths, Zip files, custom archives on so on that have been inserted into Ogre as resource locations.

This has been built and tested against OGRE 1.6.2. You might have to make your own modifications if you're working with newer (or older) versions.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

OgreVFS::OgreVFS ( const std::string &  _group = ""  ) 

Constructor.

OGRE must be initialized (ie. you must have created an Ogre::Root object somewhere) before calling this.

Parameters:
group Optional resource group name. If none is given, OGRE's default (or 'World') resource group is used.

FileInfoListPtr OgreVFS::list ( const std::string &  dir = "",
bool  recurse = true,
bool  dirs = false 
) const [virtual]

List all entries in a given directory. A blank dir should be interpreted as a the root/current directory of the archive. If dirs is true, list directories instead of files. OGRE note: The ogre resource systemd does not support recursive listing of files. We might make a separate filter for this later.

Implements Mangle::VFS::VFS.

StreamPtr OgreVFS::open ( const std::string &  name  )  [virtual]

Open a new data stream. Deleting the object should be enough to close it.

Implements Mangle::VFS::VFS.
